original_text: And at the dedication of the wall of Jerusalem they sought the Levites out of all their places, to bring them to Jerusalem, to keep the dedication with gladness, both with thanksgivings, and with singing, with cymbals, psalteries, and with harps.
korean_text: 예루살렘 성벽을 봉헌하게 되니 각처에서 레위 사람들을 찾아 예루살렘으로 데려다가 감사하며 노래하며 제금을 치며 비파와 수금을 타며 즐거이 봉헌식을 행하려 하매

sentences.original_text: And at the dedication of the wall of Jerusalem
they sought the Levites out of all their places
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모든 곳에서 레위 사람들을 찾아냈습니다

sentences.original_text: to keep the dedication with gladness
with cymbals, psalteries, and with harps
